title: Revenue Administration Management Information System presently functioning in the Inland Revenue Department - Awarding the Contract  for the software RAMIS 2.0-Part B
decision_details: - interface with the Inland Revenue Department through the web services. Taking into consideration the necessity of expediting the implementation of  the New Inland Revenue Act, the proposal made by the Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economy and Policy Development, to award the contract for changing the remaining part of the software RAMIS 2.0 which has been edited into a newer version as RAMIS 2.0 - Part B, to Singapore Cooperation Enterprise (SCE), to a sum of SDG 15,534,364, as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Negotiating Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
